extendedInfo.description: Best Coupons & Deals is a free, top-reviewed coupons app that gives you the best deals for your favorite brands. Get ready for some amazing holiday savings!Features Include:- The Best Hand-Picked Deals: updated daily by our team of coupon clippers and deal finders. Every deal is hand-selected by our team. We're always adding new brands based on user feedback.- The Best Reviews: more than five hundred 5-star ratings make us one of the best reviewed applications in the shopping category. Download the app and find out why. - Simple Organization: you can sort our deals by brand (e.g. Aeropostale, Hollister, Olive Garden, Chili's, etc), newest arrivals, Hottest deals (the best deals) and by category (fashion, food, kids, etc)- Hot Deal Alerts: you can sign up for Hot Deal Alerts in the app and never miss another great deal. We send an Android notification when we find really great deals. If you don't like to receive notifications, you can easily turn them off.- Share Deals: you can share our deals with your friends via SMS and Email. - Exclusive Offers: we don't put annoying banner ads in our application. Instead, we run exclusive offer pages that give you the opportunity to sign up for emails from top brands. Instructions:Download the application and open it. The first time the application launches, we offer the opportunity to sign up for Hot Deal Alerts. You can also deactivate or activate this feature later in the Alerts section. We also offer a chance to sign up for emails for exclusive deals. If you sign up, you will see our exclusive deals, then our hottest deals. If not, then you will just see our hottest deals page and a button to load all of our coupons.Coupons are displayed as either coupon codes (for use online) or digital coupons (for use in stores). When possible, we always recommend that you print our coupons at home prior to using them in the restaurant. Some brands don't accept coupons when displayed on a phone. You can print the coupon by navigating to the coupon details page, clicking Email This and then emailing the coupon to yourself to print from a computer.Feedback:Want to see more of a particular brand? Have problems with our application? Other ideas? Let us know in a review or by sending an email to bestcouponsanddeals@gmail.com.Terms of Use and Privacy Policy:By using this application you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy - http://pastehtml.com/view/bnr5klhqb.rtxt

reviews.comment: Uninstalled! This is one of the biggest pain in the a$$ coupon apps. I hate having to chase down on diff sites, join stuff I don\'t want, receive junk I don\'t want just get a discount I can get with no effort somewhere else.

reviews.title: GREAT
reviews.comment: this is an awesome app.!! n really useful to save money. the only thing i guess that is a bit of a downer. is that where i live its not such a big city so most of the coupons are for stores or restuarants that aren\'t where i live.but thats not really the app\'s fault,so its super awesome!

reviews.title: What is this?
reviews.comment: Dont waste your time. Nothing amazing here, I can find the same stuff on many websites. Just a list of generic coupons that have you sign up for stuff yoy dont want!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I like it
reviews.comment: I like it so far, but there isn\'t enough grocery store coupons that I can see. Probably haven\'t looked in the right area yet. Smiles...
reviews.author: Patricia Slotterback

reviews.title: Great deals, even local!
reviews.comment: I live between to cities, so is hard to find deals that are relevant to me, but this app brings all the most relevant deals right to my phone! Great for holiday or personal shopping.
reviews.author: Quinn Franco

reviews.title: I like it  :-)
reviews.comment: This app is really cool and i have found some awesome deals! Just wish you didn\'t have to print out the coupons cause i don\'t have a printer.
reviews.author: Siara Steck

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Does give great options on all kinds on different deals, from dept. stores to free apps. Ive used this daily since I downloaded it.
reviews.author: Denny Akey

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: Have to sort through what\'s listed to find what\'s relevant, but it sure beats chasing the deals up yourself.
reviews.author: Shayrl Coston

reviews.title: Phishing for email addresses
reviews.comment: There was no way to opt out of the start screen asking for my email to send deals. Every time it launched the screen was there. Very annoying and caused me to uninstall.
reviews.author: A Google User
